Plot: Pool Party plays surf rock across the vast landscapes of New Mexico while meeting some friends along the way.
Title: Pool Party: Slaves to the Waves - The Video Album
Writer: Andrew P. Aguilar, Alex Bernitsky, Rick Chapman, Bryan P. Jones, Stephen Turselli
Director: Andrew P. Aguilar, Rick Chapman, Bryan P. Jones, Stephen Turselli
Actors: Ed Shogry, Alex Bernitsky, Rick Chapman, Stephen Turselli
